lines.text: Now look, fellas. Have I ever let youse down before?
[Cats cheer "No!"]
Am I gonna help youse now?
[Cats cheer "Yes!"; one voice says "No!"]
Throw that Airdale out!
You've done a wonderful job, Pied Piper. Rid our fair city of every last rat. How did you accomplish such a magnificent feat?
Oh, shucks, Mr. Mayor, 'tweren't nothing. J-Just blew some corn right through this horn.
On behalf of our fair city, I proudly present to you...

[in rat disguise]
Gangway, fellas! Let a rat through!
A rat!
A r-r-rat!
You expecting maybe Bugs Bunny?
Mr. Pied Piper, not a penny do you get until you get rid of all the rats!
Me last of Mohicans.
[war whoop]
I'll t-take care of you after I catch that rat.
Ah, your sister smokes corn silk!
M-m-my sister doesn't smoke corn silk. S-s-she works at a butcher's shop and sm-sm-smokes hams.
I'll be b-back after you, you u-unsanitary old cat!
Ah, your brother eats jelly beans!
I w-w-wonder how he knows so much about my family?

[Speaking to The Supreme Cat after retrieving the stolen money from him]
Eh! Your sister drives a p-p-pickle wagon!
